property_token.title: Property Token
property_token.description: Parameter is used to get property details which consists of name, address, phone, prices, nearby places, and etc.

q.title: Search Query
q.description: Parameter defines the search query. You can use anything that you would use in a regular Google Hotels search.

check_in_date.title: Check In Date
check_in_date.description: Parameter defines the check-in date. The format is **YYYY-MM-DD**. e.g. `2025-03-05`

check_out_date.title: Check Out Date
check_out_date.description: Parameter defines the check-out date. The format is **YYYY-MM-DD**. e.g. `2025-03-06`

adults.title: Number of Adults
adults.description: Parameter defines the number of `adults`. Default to `2`.

children.title: Number of Children
children.description: Parameter defines the number of `children`. Default to `0`.

children_ages.title: Children's Ages
children_ages.description:
Parameter defines the ages of children. The age range is from `1` to `17`, with children who haven't reached 1 year old being considered as `1`.

Example for single child only:
`5`

Example for multiple children (seperated by comma ,):
`5,8,10`

The number of children's ages specified must match the `children`.

gl.title: Country
gl.description: Parameter defines the country to use for the Google search. It's a two-letter country code. (e.g., `us` for the United States, `uk` for United Kingdom, or `fr` for France).

hl.title: Language
hl.description: Parameter defines the language to use for the Google search. It's a two-letter language code. (e.g., `en` for English, `es` for Spanish, or `fr` for French).

currency.title: Currency
currency.description: Parameter defines the currency of the returned prices. Default to `USD`.

sort_by.title: Sort By
sort_by.description:
Parameter is used for sorting the results. Default is sort by `Relevance`.

Available options:
`3` - Lowest price
`8` - Highest rating
`13` - Most reviewed

min_price.title: Min. Price
min_price.description: Parameter defines the lower bound of price range.

max_price.title: Max. Price
max_price.description: Parameter defines the upper bound of price range.

property_types.title: Property Types
property_types.description:
Parameter defines to include only certain type of property in the results. Head to the [Google Hotels Property Types page](https://apidocs.scrapeless.com/doc-890580) for a full list of supported Hotels property types. For Vacation Rentals, please refer to the [Google Vacation Rentals Property Types page](https://apidocs.scrapeless.com/doc-890578) for a full list of supported Vacation Rentals property types.

Example for single property type only:
17

Example for multiple property types (seperated by comma ,):
17,12,18

amenities.title: Amenities
amenities.description:
Parameter defines to include only results that offer specified amenities. Head to the [Google Hotels Amenities page](https://apidocs.scrapeless.com/doc-890631) for a full list of supported Hotels amenities. For Vacation Rentals, please refer to the [Google Vacation Rentals Amenities page](https://apidocs.scrapeless.com/doc-890623) for a full list of supported Vacation Rentals amenities.

Example for single amenity only:
35

Example for multiple amenities (seperated by comma ,):
35,9,19

rating.title: Guest Rating
rating.description:
Parameter is used for filtering the results to certain rating.

Available options:
`7` - 3.5+
`8` - 4.0+
`9` - 4.5+

hotel_class.title: Hotel Class
hotel_class.description:
Parameter defines to include only certain hotel class in the results.

Available options:
`2` - 2-star
`3` - 3-star
`4` - 4-star
`5` - 5-star

Example for single hotel class only:
`2`

Example for multiple hotel class (seperated by comma `,`):
`2,3,4`

This parameter isn't available for Vacation Rentals.

free_cancellation.title: Free Cancellation
free_cancellation.description:
Parameter defines to show results that offer free cancellation.

This parameter isn't available for Vacation Rentals.

special_offers.title: Special Offers
special_offers.description:
Parameter defines to show results that have special offers.

This parameter isn't available for Vacation Rentals.
